      • save

        public boolean save​(Person person)
        This methode saves the person in the database. It aswell makes sure it exist in the client or crew accordingly.
        Parameters:
        person - to be saved.
        Returns:
        boolean if the person is proper saved or not.
        Throws:
        javax.ws.rs.BadRequestException - if person == null or person.getRole() == null or if the person already exist in the database in a certain way.

      • getIdByEmail

        public long getIdByEmail​(java.lang.String email)
        Get the id from the emailAddress.
        Parameters:
        email - to compare with
        Returns:
        id= -1 if the person is not found, id of the person if the person is found by email.
